TraceWebAspect - Class in org.springframework.cloud.sleuth.instrument.web
Aspect that adds tracing to

org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController annotated classes with public Callable methods Controller annotated classes with public Callable methods Controller or org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController annotated classes with public WebAsyncTask methods

For controllers an around aspect is created that wraps the Callable.call() method execution in TraceCallable

This aspect will continue a span created by the TraceFilter.

TraceWebAspect(Tracer, SpanNamer) - Constructor for class org.springframework.cloud.sleuth.instrument.web.TraceWebAspect
